metadata.title: CVE-2018-6176 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient file type enforcement in Extensions API in Google Chrome priorto 68.0.3440.75 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to perform privilege escalation via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
